item.description: Rather than our usual fourth Sunday brunch, we'll have just one brunch in November - December due to the holidays. And we'll try something different - The Half Door at 270 Sisson Avenue in Hartford is a classic Irish pub that offers a wonderful breakfast / brunch on the weekends. No buffet, but a nice variety on the menu, ranging from the "Big Arse Breakfast" for $7.99 to the box of Lucky Charms (they're magically delicious) for $1.29. So, come on out and join us at noon for a great time.
item.name: Sunday Brunch
